description: Automobile company, TVS plans to launch a new electric two-wheeler in the next six months.  It is expected to be XL electric. This new EV is probably going to be unveiled by TVS at the 2025 Bharat Expo.  However, it can be stated that this new EV might formally be launched by March 2025
title: TVS Reportedly Working to Launch Two New Electric Scooters in India

description: This festive season, the Kia EV6 is attracting attention with substantial discounts of up to Rs. 15 lakh. Available in two trims, the EV6 combines performance and efficiency, boasting a range of 708km and power outputs of 226bhp for the GT Line and 321bhp for the GT-Line AWD. Interested buyers should take note of potential price variations based on dealership negotiations. The EV6 presents an excellent opportunity for those looking to invest in an electric vehicle.
title: Kia Offers Attractive Discounts of Up to Rs. 15 Lakh on EV6 During Festive Season

description: Africa is experiencing significant tectonic activity, resulting in a gradual split that could lead to the formation of a new ocean in approximately 50 million years. This process is primarily observed in the East African Rift System, where geological movements are creating divisions between the Nubian and Somalian plates. Experts are examining the implications of these changes, considering factors like erosion and volcanic activity. Although this transformation will take millennia, its impact on Africa's landscape will be profound and significant.
title: Africa’s Gradual Split Could Lead to the Formation of Earth’s Sixth Ocean

description: A recent report has revealed that more than 38% of tree species globally are at risk of extinction, with human activities like deforestation and disease contributing significantly to their decline. The findings were presented at the UN COP16 biodiversity summit in Colombia, where world leaders are discussing strategies to protect natural ecosystems. Urgent conservation measures, including seed banks and habitat restoration, are essential to safeguard these vital resources and the wildlife that depends on them. The summit will conclude on 1 November, focusing on enhancing global biodiversity initiatives.
title: World’s Tree Species at Risk of Extinction, Claims New Study

description: This article explores the implications of synthetic food dyes on health, particularly in children. Following the recent California School Food Safety Act, which bans specific dyes in public schools, the FDA's stance on these additives contrasts sharply. While some studies suggest a link between synthetic dyes and behavioural issues, the FDA continues to approve their use. The article delves into the ongoing debate, recent research findings, and the potential for regulatory changes.
title: Are Synthetic Food Dyes Harmful to Children? Here’s What the Science Says

description: Researchers have discovered the ancient Maya city of Valeriana in Mexico's Yucatán Peninsula using lidar technology. This city, located in east-central Campeche, includes over 6,600 structures, such as temple pyramids and plazas, dating back to the Classic period (250-900 AD). The team, led by archaeologist Luke Auld-Thomas, repurposed existing lidar data originally collected for ecological studies. This innovative approach highlights the potential of lidar in archaeology. Further on-site investigations are planned to verify these findings and enhance the understanding of Maya civilisation.
title: Ancient Maya City Valeriana Discovered in Mexico with Over 6,600 Structures

description: Indian scientists have identified a new exoplanet named TOI-6651b, which is five times larger than Earth and has a mass around 60 times greater. Located in the Neptunian desert, it orbits a Sun-like star every 5.06 days. The planet's composition suggests unique evolutionary processes, providing valuable insights into how such dense exoplanets form and evolve. This discovery highlights India's increasing contributions to global astronomical research.
title: Indian Scientists Discover A Massive Exoplanet That is Five Times Larger Than Earth

description: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) has unveiled remarkable footage from the new Compact Coronagraph (CCOR-1), which is aboard the GOES-19 satellite. This advanced telescope captures charged particles and solar eruptions from the Sun’s corona, vital for monitoring solar activity as it approaches its peak in 2025. By blocking out the Sun's intense light, CCOR-1 allows scientists to observe crucial solar events, enabling better predictions of potential impacts on Earth’s technology and infrastructure.
title: NASA's New Solar Telescope Captures Dramatic Footage of the Sun Spraying Huge Charged Particles

description: Researchers at Osaka Metropolitan University have successfully identified the 3D structure of an artificial light-harvesting complex II (LHCII). This structure mimics the natural LHCII found in plants and plays a critical role in photosynthesis. Using in vitro reconstitution and cryo-electron microscopy, the team demonstrated that the artificial complex closely resembles its natural counterpart. This breakthrough offers insights that could enhance the development of artificial photosynthesis technologies and improve energy capture methods.
title: Scientists Reveals New Method to Analyse 3D Structure of Artificial Photosynthetic Antenna

description: NASA's Mars Perseverance rover has unveiled intriguing findings at Serpentine Rapids, a location characterised by its striking red rocks interspersed with distinctive green spots. These features, observed in a nighttime mosaic captured by the rover's SHERLOC WATSON camera, may provide insights into Mars' geological history. The green spots are thought to be remnants of ancient processes involving liquid water, similar to those seen in red beds on Earth, where oxidised iron is transformed into a reduced state through chemical reactions. Although the rover could not directly analyse these spots due to positioning constraints, the team is keen to explore similar features in the future. As Perseverance ascends the steep Jezero Crater rim, excitement mounts within the scientific community regarding what additional secrets these Martian rocks might reveal about the planet’s past and its potential for past life.
title: NASA's Mars Perseverance Rover Uncovers Distinct Red Rocks with Green Spots at 'Serpentine Rapids'

description: China's Tiangong space station, operational for nearly two years, is preparing for significant upgrades to expand its capabilities. Plans include modifying the station's structure from a T-shape to a cross shape, allowing for additional modules. The development of the Mengzhou spacecraft, designed for lunar and Tiangong missions, is also on the agenda, with its debut expected around 2027. Additionally, the Chinese Space Station Telescope (CSST) will enhance global astronomical research. International cooperation in space exploration is also a key focus for China as it aims to sustain Tiangong for at least a decade.
title: China’s Tiangong Space Station Set for Expansion with New Modules and Upgrades

description: Apple has rolled out the iOS 17.7.1 update for users who are yet to upgrade to iOS 18 — the company’s latest operating system (OS). Although it does not bring any new features, the update introduces crucial security fixes for issues such as sensitive kernel state leaks, modification of protected system files and violation of iframe sandboxing policy.
title: Apple Rolls Out iOS 17.7.1 Update for iPhone Models Not on iOS 18: Details

description: Honor 200 series is getting a new update which is finally introducing the Circle to Search feature in India. The RM3 is an over-the-air (OTA) update for the Honor 200 5G and Honor 200 Pro 5G smartphones. Alongside the new artificial intelligence (AI) feature, it also adds the October 2024 Google security patch as well as performance enhancements.
title: Honor 200 Series in India Gets Circle to Search With Latest Software Update

description: Xiaomi 15 was unveiled in China on Tuesday (October 29) alongside the Xiaomi 15 Pro. The new lineup comes as a successor to last year's Xiaomi 14 duo and runs on the latest Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC. The vanilla Xiaomi 15 features a 6.36-inch 1.5K OLED display with a peak brightness of 3,200nits, while the Pro model has a 2K resolution display. The Xiaomi 15 series runs on HyperOS 2 and features a Leica-tuned triple rear camera setup led by a 50-megapixel primary sensor.
title: Xiaomi 15, Xiaomi 15 Pro With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, Triple Rear Cameras Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Redmi A3 Pro has been unveiled in select global markets. It has now been spotted on the Bluetooth SIG website, which suggests that it could arrive in more countries soon. The design and specifications of the handset suggest that it is a remodelled version of the Redmi 14C and Poco C75.
title: Redmi A3 Pro With 5,160mAh Battery Unveiled; Bluetooth Listing Suggests Launch in More Markets

description: Red Magic 10 Pro series will be unveiled in China soon. The company has yet to announce a launch date but it has teased the upcoming arrival of the lineup. The chipset details of the purported handsets have been confirmed as well. Meanwhile, a tipster has hinted at some key specifications of one of the Red Magic 10 series phones.
title: Red Magic 10 Pro Series Confirmed to Use Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC; Tipped to Get 7-Inch Display

description: Google's Pixel Watch models have used chipsets from Samsung and Qualcomm since their inception in 2022. As per latest leaks related to Google's chip division, the brand will switch things up with the Pixel Watch 5. Google is reportedly considering adding its custom tensor processor to the Pixel Watch 5 starting in 2026. However, the Tensor chip could use older CPU cores
title: Google Pixel Watch 5 to Get First Custom Tensor Smartwatch Chip in 2026: Report

description: A mysterious artificial intelligence (AI) model is currently ranking on top of a benchmarking platform’s leaderboard, but nobody can find any information about it. The mysterious model in question is dubbed Red Panda and it has ranked at the top position on the Artificial Analysis benchmark’s text-to-image generation leaderboard. The AI model has outranked major AI image-generating platforms such as Replicate, Midjourney, and Stability.ai.
title: Mysterious AI Image Generator ‘Red Panda’ Emerges on Top of Benchmark Leaderboard

description: Google is rolling out features powered by artificial intelligence (AI) to the web and mobile, including new shortcuts. Following the latest Workspace updates, the Mountain View-based tech giant brings a new ‘Help Me Write’ shortcut which leverages AI to provide writing suggestions when writing or refining text in open text fields on the web. Additionally, another shortcut for the ‘Polish’ feature has been added to the mobile and web platforms.
title: Google Rolls Out AI-Powered ‘Help Me Write’ Shortcut to Gmail for Web, Expands ‘Polish’ to More Platforms

description: Intel is expected to report its biggest quarterly revenue drop in five quarters on Thursday, potentially signaling more erosion of data center and personal computer market share for the once iconic American chipmaker.
title: Intel Set for Big Drop in Quarterly Revenue as Chipmaker Struggles to Bounce Back

description: OnePlus Open 2 is expected to break cover early next year as a follow-up to the OnePlus Open. Smartphone enthusiasts are keen to see how the company can improve upon the OnePlus Open. A new leak out of China points to a major battery capacity increase and slim build. The OnePlus Open 2 is also said to offer wireless charging support.
title: OnePlus Open 2 Leak Suggests Wireless Charging Support, 5,700mAh Battery, and Slim Build

description: Oppo Find X8 Ultra is expected to join the newly launched Oppo Find X8 and Find X8 Pro handsets soon. Oppo has yet to confirm the purported smartphone but details about it have recently been doing rounds on the rumour mill. The phone was recently tipped to launch next year alongside the Oppo Find N5. A tipster has now suggested some probable camera specifications of the Oppo Find X8 Ultra.
title: Oppo Find X8 Ultra Said to Get Quad Rear Camera Unit Including Dual Periscope Telephoto Sensors

description: Apple is expected to report its biggest quarterly revenue jump in two years on Thursday, with iPhone demand faring better than recent years toward the end of the company's annual release cycle, especially in China.
title: Apple Set for Biggest Revenue Jump in 2 Years on iPhone Demand in China

description: The US company exported nearly $6 billion of India-made iPhones, an increase of a third in value terms from a year earlier, people familiar with the matter said, asking not to be named as the information is private. That puts annual exports on track to surpass the about $10 billion of fiscal 2024.
title: Apple Ships $6 Billion of iPhone Models From India in Big China Shift

description: NASA has identified nine candidate landing regions for the Artemis III mission, which marks humanity’s return to the Moon after fifty years. The selected regions are near the lunar South Pole, rich in scientific opportunities. These areas will be assessed for geological features and resource potential, especially water. Future missions will also benefit from this ongoing research, with the final landing sites announced closer to the mission launch date.
title: NASA Unveils Nine Potential Landing Regions for Artemis III Moon Mission

description: Apple is expected to announce the updated Mac mini later this week. Ahead of the formal reveal, Amazon has seemingly leaked the device and some of its specifications. A comparison chart on the e-commerce website reportedly showed the unreleased Mac mini with M4 and M4 Pro chip options. It appears to have 64GB of RAM and up to 8TB of storage. The new Mac mini also appears to be smaller than its predecessors.
title: Apple's Upcoming Mac Mini With M4, M4 Pro Chip Allegedly Listed on Amazon

description: OnePlus 13 is all set to go official in the company's home country on October 31. In the latest round of teasers, OnePlus has disclosed the water resistance rating and other key specifications of the flagship. The OnePlus 13 is confirmed to offer a higher IP rating than the OnePlus 12. It will also come with an new and improved fingerprint sensor for authentication.
title: OnePlus 13 Will Get an IP68/IP69 Rating, Ultrasonic Fingerprint Sensor, More

description: Google announced the expansion of AI Overviews to more than 100 countries on Monday. The feature, which offers a brief overview of the searched query using artificial intelligence (AI) was earlier limited to a few territories. However, the Mountain View-based tech giant is now pushing to a wider user base with this update. The company highlighted that it is the feature's largest expansion drive since launch.
title: Google AI Overviews Rolling Out to More Than 100 Countries in a Major Expansion Drive

description: India's Jio Payment Solutions, a wholly-owned subsidiary of billionaire Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Group firm Jio Financial Services, has received the central bank's approval to operate as an online payment aggregator, Jio Financial said on Tuesday.
title: Jio Payment Solutions Gets RBI Nod to Operate as Online Payment Aggregator

description: Realme GT 7 Pro is set to launch in China on November 4. The company has teased several key features of the handset ahead of the launch. It is confirmed to come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a Samsung Eco 2 OLED Plus display. Now, the starting price for the upcoming smartphone has also surfaced online.
title: Realme GT 7 Pro Price Leaked Ahead of November 4 Launch
Bringing the Sun's Goodness into Your Home: Voltas Beko Refrigerators with Harvest Fresh Technology

description: Prime Video's Game 7, a five-part series releasing on October 22, revisits iconic Game 7 moments from baseball, hockey, and basketball. Featuring interviews with sports legends like Mark Messier and Dirk Nowitzki, the series explores the energy and pressure of sports' greatest deciders, giving fans a rare look at these pivotal games through exclusive footage and player reflections.
title: Game 7  Documentary Exploring Legendary Sports Moments Now Streaming on Prime Video

description: Tamil horror thriller Guardian starring Hansika Motwani as Aparna, an architect facing eerie supernatural events, will stream on Aha Tamil from October 30, 2024. Directed by Guru Saravanan and Sabari, the film initially premiered in theatres on March 8, 2024. Just in time for Diwali, fans can catch this spooky tale of mystery and suspense on Aha Tamil and OTTplay Premium.
title: Guardian OTT Release Date: Hansika Motwani’s Horror Thriller Set Release on Aha

description: In 2024, ZEE5 saw notable growth, particularly in regional languages and family-oriented content, which now accounts for 50% of its viewing. Chief Business Officer Manish Kalra credits the platform’s emphasis on culturally resonant, family-friendly narratives for this success. ZEE5’s increased reach into Tier II and III markets and a 25% rise in time spent per user indicate a strong response to its content strategy. ZEEL’s subscription revenue grew by 9.25%, driven by ZEE5’s expanding popularity in regional genres and 4K streaming.
title: ZEE5 Reports Major Growth in Regional Language and Family-Friendly Content in 2024

description: Apple has rolled out the iOS 18.1 update for the iPhone, which brings Apple Intelligence—the suite of artificial intelligence (AI) features that the company previewed at its Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2024 in June. The features are available on Apple devices such as the iPhone, iPad, and Mac, but only select models are compatible. Until now, Apple Intelligence was only available in beta but has been globally released, enabling users to take advantage of AI features.
title: How to Enable Apple Intelligence on Your iPhone: Compatible Models and Features

description: The Biden administration said on Monday it is finalising rules that will limit US investments in artificial intelligence and other technology sectors in China that could threaten US national security.
title: US Finalises Rules to Curb AI Investments in China, Impose Other Restrictions

description: China is putting demand on its automakers to halt expansion in the European union (EU) due to the increasing conflicts over Electric Vehicles (EV).  A hold on active searches is demanded by China.  This tension rose when customs taxes levied by the European Union increased significantly
title: EU-China EV Tariff Dispute: Beijing Requests Automakers To Stop Expanding in Europe

description: Destiny maker Bungie is working on Marathon, a PvP extraction shooter that was announced in 2023. The studio has now provided an update on the game, saying that development on it was “on track”. Bungie, however, did not reveal any Marathon gameplay, choosing instead to share a concept art images from the shooter.
title: Bungie Says Marathon Development is 'On Track', Shares New Screenshots

description: Netflix has introduced a new feature dubbed Moments for mobile users which lets them save, relieve and share scenes from their favourite films and shows. It appears as a new button on the bottom of the screen alongside the playback controls. According to Netflix, the saved scenes from acclaimed shows such as BEEF, Bridgerton or Nobody Wants can be captured and also be shared on social media platforms with friends and family.
title: Netflix Rolls Out Moments Feature for Mobile That Lets Users Save and Share Scenes from Films, Shows

description: Vijay 69, releasing on Netflix on 8 November 2024, is a heartwarming film starring Anupam Kher as a 69-year-old man who challenges societal norms by deciding to train for a triathlon. Directed by Akshay Roy, the film mixes humour and emotion, celebrating resilience and the spirit of never giving up, no matter one’s age. With supporting performances by Chunky Panday and Mihir Ahuja, the film has already sparked interest, especially with Kher marking 40 years in cinema.
title: Vijay 69 OTT Release Date: Anupam Kher Starrer Movie to Premiere on Netflix on November 8

description: Meta is reportedly developing an artificial intelligence (AI) search engine. According to a report, the social media giant wants to compete with existing players such as Google, Microsoft’s Bing, and DuckDuckGo. The company reportedly plans to use AI for the search engine, likely giving it a Perplexity-like avatar. Key details about the platform’s implementation are currently missing.
title: Meta Reportedly Developing an AI-Powered Search Engine to Take on Google and Microsoft’s Bing

description: Tecno Megapad 10 has been unveiled in select global markets. The tablet is equipped with a MediaTek Helio G80 chipset paired with 4GB of RAM and up to 256GB of onboard storage. The company has yet to announce the price and availability details of the tablet.
title: Tecno Megapad 10 With 10.1-Inch HD+ Screen, 7,000mAh Battery Launched

description: The popular Mirzapur series is making its way from streaming to theatres. Producers Farhan Akhtar and Ritesh Sidhwani have announced a film adaptation set for a 2026 release, featuring original cast members like Pankaj Tripathi, Ali Fazal, and Divyenndu Sharma. Directed by Gurmeet Singh, the movie promises to bring the same intensity and drama that fans love, with a few new twists. The announcement, strategically timed during Diwali, has already created excitement among fans.
title: Mirzapur Film Announced, to Hit Theatres in 2026 with Original Cast

description: Ahead of the Binance Blockchain Week scheduled to be held in Dubai this week, company CMO Rachel Conlan talked to Gadgets360 about the exchange’s areas of focus in terms of its marketing dos and don'ts as the firm expands its businesses globally.
title: Not Just ‘Hype’ but ‘Genuine Value’: Binance CMO Rachel Conlan Decodes Exchange's Crypto Marketing Playbook

description: Pixel 9 series was launched in August at Google's Made By Google event. The next generation Pixel 10 lineup isn't expected until the second half of next year but we are already starting to see leaks about the 2026 Pixel 11 lineup. A new leak from Google's chip division suggests that the tech giant plans to add an under-display infrared (IR) camera to the Pixel 11.
title: Google Pixel 11 to Feature an Under-Display Infrared (IR) Camera for Face Unlock: Report

description: Amazon Prime Video has unveiled the first trailer for its upcoming series adaptation of Cruel Intentions, set to premiere on November 21, 2024. This modern retelling focuses on step-siblings Caroline Merteuil and Lucien Belmont, portrayed by Sarah Catherine Hook and Zac Burgess, who are immersed in the social dynamics of Greek life at an elite Washington, D.C. college. The trailer features a contemporary take on the themes of manipulation and deceit that characterised the original 1999 film. The cast also includes Savannah Lee Smith and Sean Patrick Thomas, who reprises his role from the original movie.
title: Cruel Intentions Series OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Astronomers have discovered a new organic molecule, 1-cyanopyrene, in interstellar space. This finding challenges the long-held belief that carbon-rich compounds cannot survive harsh conditions in space. Detected in the Taurus Molecular Cloud-1, this discovery opens new avenues for understanding how carbon behaves in the universe. Researchers emphasize the importance of this molecule for the future study of interstellar chemistry and the formation of stars and planets.
title: Astronomers Discover 1-Cyanopyrene in Interstellar Space Revealing Carbon Secrets

description: Apple announced on Monday that its suite of artificial intelligence (AI) features — dubbed Apple Intelligence — is now widely available for devices such as the iPhone, iPad and Mac. Apple’s latest iOS 18.1, iPadOS 18.1, and macOS Sequoia 15.1 updates are currently rolling out and include additions such as Writing Tools, Clean Up and automatic movie creation.
title: iOS 18.1 Update for iPhone Rolling Out With First Set of Apple Intelligence Features: What’s New

description: Apple has unveiled a new iMac powered by its latest Apple Silicon M4 chipset and it now comes with accessories supporting USB Type-C connectivity. Attachments such as the Magic Keyboard, Magic Trackpad and Magic Mouse are now fully USB Type-C compatible and can be purchased in multiple colourways, fulfilling the long-standing request of Apple users around the world.
title: Apple Updates Magic Mouse, Magic Keyboard and Other iMac Accessories with USB Type-C, New Colours

description: Redmi Note 14 series was unveiled in China in September. A tipster has now hinted at the India launch timeline of the Redmi Note 14 series. The lineup could come to India later this year in December, or see an early January launch. The lineup includes a base, a Pro and a Pro+ variant.
title: Redmi Note 14 Series India Launch Tipped to Take Place in Late December or Early January
